text: application for order under s 411(1) of corporations act 2001 (cth) that company convene meeting of members to consider proposed scheme of arrangement
term of scheme that "to the extent permitted by law" shares will vest in acquiring company free of interests of third parties
whether court should approve scheme containing a provision that shares will be transferred free of all encumbrances. held : scheme approved subject to deletion of the "no encumbrances" clause.
